description: A Dart class implementing a repository pattern for CRUD operations on 'notes' in a SQLite database, including methods for creating, updating, deleting, and querying notes with filtering options.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class managing CRUD operations for notes storage, utilizing a singleton DatabaseHelper instance.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database, replacing existing entries with the same primary key.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database based on its ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID, returns null if not found.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Fetches all notes matching optional search and tag filters, ordered by most recently updated.
